aboutIntro-2: My name is Stephen Lai, I have been learning and working on web application for over three years and I am a fullstack web developer. I build web apps with all sorts of technologies especially with VueJS & ReactJS, not because they are super poplular but they have all kinds of supports, forums, and a huge ecosystem for building awesome apps
